== dictionaries/rougail/01-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
variable:
  redefine: true
  default:
    jinja: yes
    description: returns yes
----
== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
variable:
  description: a variable
  default:
    jinja: no
    description: returns no
----
